summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the north one-half of the east-half of Tract 3, Kelsey's Brighton Beach Acre Tracts; and Lots 21, 22 and west 20 feet of Lot 20, Block 32, Hill Tract Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-286 and 17-232, respectively.
